creditline: Gift of Mr. Edward A. Foster
markings: Artist\'s stamp, in red ink, placed diagonally, in lower left corner; \'Baudet (?) droite\', on bottom right strip; various inscriptions, in pencil and chalk, on other attached strips
medium: Brown chalk and charcoal with stumping, heightened with white chalk on cream wove paper with backing of flecked gray wove paper
provenance: Edward A. Foster, New Mexico until 1980; his gift to MIA
title: The Grand Guignol
